title: Trump considers ending peace negotiations in Russia's war on Ukraine
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is frustrated with Russia and Ukraine and could instruct his administration to pull out of peace talks.

title: A new phase begins in Trump's battle with higher education
shortDescription: Colleges have been pushing back against the Trump administration's policies in a mostly quiet way. Then came Harvard's loud defiance.

title: Trump scraps federal COVID-19 website for virus lab-leak theory
shortDescription: The White House replaced the federal governmentâ€™s hub for news and updates on COVID-19 with a website saying the virus leaked out of a Chinese lab.

title: Trump: Carter died 'a happy man' because he wasn't 'worst president'
shortDescription: During an Oval Office meeting with the Italian prime minister, Trump shared his thoughts about former U.S. Presidents Jimmy Carter and Joe Biden.

title: IRS turmoil continues as Trump again switches acting commissioner
shortDescription: The shakeup reportedly stems from a clash between Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent and Elon Musk

title: Trump leans into deportation fight he thinks he can win
shortDescription: The Trump administration has been eager to push back on criticism of how it is handling the Kilmar Abrego Garcia case.

title: Trump vs. Harvard feud escalates with search for foreign funding, ties
shortDescription: The Trump administration escalated its feud with Harvard University, seeking records on foreign funding going back a decade and on some foreign ties.

title: Trump administration publishes cache of RFK assassination records
shortDescription: Thousands of pages of records related to the assassination of Sen. Robert F. Kennedy were posted online in response to a Trump executive order.

title: Trump under pressure as the number of revoked student visas rise
shortDescription: With more than 1,000 student visas revoked nationwide, students, schools and politicians are pushing back.

title: White House reiterates claims that it will protect Social Security benefits
shortDescription: The White House says that it is aiming to reduce improper payments made by Social Security, but reiterated its claims that it would preserve the program.
